LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Clibanar.label: Clibanar
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Clibanar.description: A heavily armed pioneer tank with an improved engine. It is equipped with a powerful Wasteland Reclamation Missile.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Miclic.label: Clibanar Multi-Purpose Cannon
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Miclic.description: A turret fitted with a cannon that fires 13.7mm Hotchkiss rounds, which is a bit more accurate than the conventional cannon.
LanguageData.Miho_MiclicReady.label: Wasteland Reclamation Missile
LanguageData.Miho_Miclic.label: Wasteland Reclamation Missile
